mapper.insert: insert into diary (title, content, date, author_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{date}, #{authorId})
mapper.select: select D.*, U.loginId as authorLoginId from diary D join user_shared US on D.author_id = US.owner_user_id join users U on D.author_id = U.userId where US.shared_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update diary set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, date=#{date} where id=#{id}
